definition: a representation of a person (especially in the form of sculpture), imagine
details:
noun
- a representation of a person (especially in the form of sculpture)
= synonyms: effigy
- a visual representation of an object, scene, person or abstraction, produced on a surface
= example: a visual representation of an object, scene, person or abstraction, produced on a surface
= synonyms: icon, ikon, picture
- the general impression that something presents to the public
= example: the general impression that something presents to the public
- (Jungian psychology) a personal facade that one presents to the world
= example: (Jungian psychology) a personal facade that one presents to the world
= synonyms: persona
- an iconic mental representation
= example: an iconic mental representation
= synonyms: mental image
- a standard or typical example
= synonyms: prototype, paradigm, epitome
- language used in a figurative or nonliteral sense
= synonyms: figure
- (mathematics) the set of values of the dependent variable for which a function is defined
= example: (mathematics) the set of values of the dependent variable for which a function is defined
= synonyms: range of a function, range
- someone who closely resembles a famous person (especially an actor)
= synonyms: double
verb
- imagine
= synonyms: figure
- render visible, as by means of MRI
